trans-unit.source: Provides a set of properties, such as typeface or foreground brush, that can be applied to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> object.
This is an abstract class.
The text layout client provides a concrete implementation of this abstract class.
This enables the client to implement text run properties in a way that corresponds with the associated formatting store.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> class.
Gets the brush that is used to paint the background color of the text run.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> value that represents the background color.
Gets the baseline style for a text that is positioned on the vertical axis.
An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.BaselineAlignment"></xref>.
Gets the culture information for the text run.
A value of <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that represents the culture of the text run.
Gets the text size in points, which is then used for font hinting.
Points are defined as 1/72 of an inch.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents the text size in points.
The default is 12 pt.
Gets the text size in points for the text run.
A DIP is 1/96 of an inch.
As DIP increases the size of the text increases.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents the text size in DIPs (Device Independent Pixels).
The default is 12 DIP.
Gets the brush that is used to paint the foreground color of the text run.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> value that represents the foreground color.
Gets the number substitution settings, which determines who numbers in text are displayed in different cultures.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref> value.
Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
The current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.PixelsPerDip"></xref> value.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> objects used for the text run.
A <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> value.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> objects used for the text run.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> value.
Gets the typeface for the text run.
A value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>.
Gets the typography properties for the text run.
A value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunTypographyProperties"></xref>.
